title: Blue cheese stuffed mushrooms with caramelised red onion chutney
ingredients: ['25g unsalted butter', '250ml boiling water', '3 sprigs fresh thyme', '4 large mushrooms (e.g. Portobello)', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '200g blue cheese, cubed', '1 tablespoon crushed walnuts', '2 teaspoons finely chopped parsley', '4 dollops caramelised red onion chutney']
